resources.string: IH+ transforms everyday landscapes into sites of bio-cultural diversity and wild happenings. Mobile phones are generally deployed as devices of rapid communication and consumerism, to get you what you want and where you want as quickly as possible. This app re-uses this technology as a tool of environmental imagination and slowing-down. By importing "nature" and wilderness into virtually any location, IH+ encourages its users to experience seemingly common places as sublime landscapes.\nwww.ecoarttech.org

a project by ecoarttech
 (leila nadir & cary peppermint)
 
 software development:
 polina koronkevich
 
 created with funding from:
